alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 259 PM MST, gauge reports indicated flooding due to heavy rainfall yesterday. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin and Tonto Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
